aboutPreview.label: Welcome to Royelle
aboutPreview.title: Experience Luxury & Elegance in Every Stay
paragraphs: Nestled in the heart of Colombo, Royelle Hotel stands as a beacon of refined hospitality and timeless elegance. Our luxurious establishment combines world-class amenities with warm Sri Lankan hospitality to create an unforgettable experience for every guest.

Whether you're here for business or leisure, our strategically located property offers breathtaking city views, award-winning dining experiences, state-of-the-art conference facilities, and a serene spa sanctuary where you can unwind and rejuvenate.

rooms.title: Deluxe Room
rooms.description: Spacious room with king-size bed, modern amenities, and city views

rooms.title: Executive Suite
rooms.description: Premium suite with separate living area, balcony, and premium amenities

rooms.title: Presidential Suite
rooms.description: Ultimate luxury with private pool, butler service, and panoramic views

services.title: Fine Dining
services.description: Experience culinary excellence at our award-winning restaurants featuring international cuisine and local delicacies.

services.title: Infinity Pool & Spa
services.description: Relax and rejuvenate at our rooftop infinity pool and full-service spa with panoramic city views.

services.title: Fitness Center
services.description: State-of-the-art gym facilities with modern equipment and professional trainers available 24/7.

services.title: Business Center
services.description: Fully equipped meeting rooms and conference facilities perfect for corporate events and gatherings.

services.title: Valet Parking
services.description: Complimentary valet parking and airport transfer services for all our guests.

services.title: 24/7 Concierge
services.description: Our dedicated concierge team is always ready to assist with your requests and reservations.

promotions.title: Summer Escape Package
promotions.description: Enjoy a luxurious summer getaway with complimentary breakfast, spa access, and late checkout.

promotions.title: Romantic Honeymoon Suite
promotions.description: Celebrate love with candlelit dinner, champagne, couples spa treatment, and rose petal decoration.

promotions.title: Business Travel Deal
promotions.description: Perfect for corporate stays with meeting room access, high-speed WiFi, and business lounge privileges.

reviews.name: Sarah Mitchell
reviews.text: Absolutely stunning hotel! The attention to detail and exceptional service made our honeymoon unforgettable. The rooftop pool has breathtaking views, and the spa was pure bliss. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: James Anderson
reviews.text: Perfect location for business travel. The meeting facilities are top-notch, and the staff went above and beyond to accommodate our needs. The restaurant's breakfast buffet is phenomenal!

reviews.name: Priya Sharma
reviews.text: A luxurious escape in the heart of the city! The Presidential Suite exceeded all expectations. Impeccable service, elegant rooms, and world-class amenities. Will definitely return!

callToAction.title: Ready to Get Started?
callToAction.description: Join thousands of satisfied guests and experience the difference today. Book your appointment now or contact us for more information.
